attributes.action: petition regarding a change needed in personal independence assessements
attributes.background: Personal independence payments system is not working , the government needs to sort this . There are many people loosing PIP when transferring from DLA and loosing cars wich is there lifeline it's got to stop .

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like PIP assessments to be changed.
